Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: ~suryalnvs and myself worked on setting up peer network on latest docker images generated and submitted to docker hub account. *Ansible script* pulls the docker images on remote machine from docker hub and spinup peer network.

Action.author: suryalnvs
Action.body: Made changes to the existing ansible script to launch the peer network on z-machine and power machine as well by pulling the latest images and also worked on ansible script to setup a non-vagrant environment.
